groups.name: env.printer
groups.description: Configuration properties for the Environment Printer starter.

properties.name: env.printer.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the environment printer functionality. When disabled, no environment variables will be printed at startup and the endpoint will not be available.

properties.name: env.printer.endpoint-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the HTTP endpoint for environment variables. When disabled, only startup logging will occur.

properties.name: env.printer.project-only
properties.description: Filter to show only project-related environment variables. When enabled, filters out common OS and system environment variables.

properties.name: env.printer.exclude-prefixes
properties.description: List of environment variable prefixes to exclude from output. Useful for hiding OS-specific or unwanted environment variables.

properties.name: env.printer.include-patterns
properties.description: List of environment variable name patterns to include when project-only is enabled. These are common project-related environment variables.
